Package test

Testing library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InfiniteLoopTest
    Starts an infinite loop and runs until timeout.
    SelfTest
    Tests the testing library itself.
    Series
    Test series.
    Series.CleanupThread
    Cleanup thread.
    Series.CleanupTimeoutTask
    Timer task to time out the cleanup thread.
    Series.TestState
    Individual test state.
    Series.TestThread
    Test main thread.
    Series.TestTimeoutTask
    Timer task to time out the test main thread.
    SeriesReport
    Test series report.
    TemporaryDirectory
    Temporary directories for testing.
    TemporaryDirectory.CleanupShutdownHook
    Cleanup task.
    TemporaryDirectoryTest
    Checks TemporaryDirectory.
    Test
    Base class of tests.
    TestReport
    Individual test report.
    TestUtil
    Common helper methods for testing.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FailedDuringTask
    Represents a test failure that occurred while the test was performing a particular task.
    FatalError
    Indicates that a serious testing library error has occurred, such as failure to construct a test object, or failure to clean up system resources.
    TestFailed
    Indicates that a test has failed.
    Timeout
    Indicates that a test has failed due to timeout.

Package test Description

Testing library.

The testing library provides the base class Test, which simplifies the writing of multithreaded tests with timeout. It also provides the Series class for creating and running test series.

The library itself may be tested using the SelfTest class.
